subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Guhila dynasty of Mewar?
question_hi: मेवाड़ के गुहिला राजवंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal was the founder of the Guhila dynasty of Mewar.
explanation_hi: बप्पा रावल मेवाड़ के गुहिला राजवंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which Rajput dynasty ruled over the region of Kanauj?
question_hi: कौन से राजपूत राजवंश ने कनौज क्षेत्र पर शासन किया?
explanation_en: The Pratihar dynasty ruled over the region of Kanauj.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार राजवंश ने कनौज क्षेत्र पर शासन किया।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous king of the Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान राजवंश के प्रसिद्ध राजा कौन थे?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was the famous king of the Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: पृथ्वीराज चौहान चौहान राजवंश के प्रसिद्ध राजा थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Guhil dynasty of Mewar was established in which year?
question_hi: मेवाड़ के गुहिला राजवंश की स्थापना किस वर्ष में हुई थी?
explanation_en: The Guhil dynasty of Mewar was established in 734 AD.
explanation_hi: मेवाड़ के गुहिला राजवंश की स्थापना ७३४ ईस्वी में हुई थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the ruler of Mewar during the Battle of Haldighati?
question_hi: हल्दीघाटी की लड़ाई के दौरान मेवाड़ के शासक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Rana Pratap was the ruler of Mewar during the Battle of Haldighati.
explanation_hi: हल्दीघाटी की लड़ाई के दौरान मेवाड़ के शासक राणा प्रताप थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Pratihar dynasty was founded by:
question_hi: प्रतिहार राजवंश की स्थापना किसने की?
explanation_en: The Pratihar dynasty was founded by Harichand.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार राजवंश की स्थापना हरिचंद ने की।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Chauhan dynasty ruled over which region?
question_hi: चौहान राजवंश ने किस क्षेत्र पर शासन किया?
explanation_en: The Chauhan dynasty ruled over Delhi and Ajmer.
explanation_hi: चौहान राजवंश ने दिल्ली और अजमेर पर शासन किया।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Sisodia dynasty of Mewar?
question_hi: मेवाड़ के सिसोदिया राजवंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Rana Lakha was the founder of the Sisodia dynasty of Mewar.
explanation_hi: राणा लाखा मेवाड़ के सिसोदिया राजवंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Pratihar dynasty was also known as:
question_hi: प्रतिहार राजवंश को और क्या नाम से जाना जाता था?
explanation_en: The Pratihar dynasty was also known as Mushabbar.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार राजवंश को मुशब्बर के नाम से भी जाना जाता था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The Guhila dynasty was a branch of which Rajput clan?
question_hi: गुहिला राजवंश किस राजपूत वंश की शाखा थी?
explanation_en: The Guhila dynasty was a branch of the Sisodia Rajput clan.
explanation_hi: गुहिला राजवंश सिसोदिया राजपूत वंश की शाखा थी।
